text: Seven Sinners is a 1925 American mystery comedy movie directed by first time director Lewis Milestone and starring Clive Brook, Marie Prevost, Heinie Conklin, Claude Gillingwater. It was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * Category:1925 comedy movies Category:1920s mystery movies Category:American mystery movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by Lewis Milestone Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: Seven Sinners (1925 movie)
